Package com.advertisementproject.confirmationtokenservice.messagebroker.config

Class MessageBrokerConfig

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.confirmationtokenservice.messagebroker.config.MessageBrokerConfig
@Configuration
public class MessageBrokerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
Configurations for RabbitMQ message broker including specifications for queues and exchanges to be used for cross microservice communication

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageBrokerConfig

      public MessageBrokerConfig()

  • Method Details

    • userDeleteFanoutBinding

      @Bean public org.springframework.amqp.core.Declarables userDeleteFanoutBinding()
      Declarables configuration bean
      Returns:
      a declarables object including a queue to listen to for when to delete confirmation tokens, a fanout exchange which User Service application can send messages to when a user is deleted and a binding which copies message in the "user.delete" exchange and sends it to "confirmationTokenDelete" which the this application can listen for.

    • enableUserQueue

      @Bean public org.springframework.amqp.core.Queue enableUserQueue()
      Direct messaging queue configuration bean
      Returns:
      direct messaging queue to inform User Service that it should enable a user.

    • emailTokenQueue

      @Bean public org.springframework.amqp.core.Queue emailTokenQueue()
      Direct messaging queue configuration bean
      Returns:
      direct messaging queue to inform Email Service that a new token has been created for a user id.

    • permissionsAddQueue

      @Bean public org.springframework.amqp.core.Queue permissionsAddQueue()
      Direct messaging queue configuration bean
      Returns:
      direct messaging queue to inform Permissions Service that it should create permissions for a specific user id.
